channel.title: Errors That Crash MY Server
channel.description:
Sometimes randomly this will come up tons of times in runserver and d/c everybody.
Software caused connection abort:recvfailed at java.net.socketInputStream.socketRead0(NativeMethod) at java.net.socketInputStream.read(UnknownSource) at java.net.socketInputStream.read(UnknownSource) at.client.packetProcess(Playerhandler.java:136) at Server.main(server.java:45)
